description:
After he`s fired from his party of heroes, the 15-year-old Kurt turns to a temp agency for work.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiko Hyouka no Hikui Zatsuyou-gakari ga, Jitsu wa Tondemo Skill no Mochinushi Datta to Iui Yoku Aru Hanashi
The Common Tale of How the Guy in Charge of Chores with Low Self-Esteem Turned Out to Actually Possess Incredible Skills
自己評価の低い雑用係が, 実はとんでもスキルの持ち主だったというよくある話
